stories.headline: KIDS AND VIOLENCE: Behind school walls
stories.summary: An examination of school discipline data revealed significant discrepancies in gun-related expulsions reported by schools, leading to a deeper analysis of school violence data.

stories.headline: CRIME AND COURTS: Conviction rate
stories.summary: The investigation into San Francisco DA's office revealed high dismissal rates and alarming plea-bargaining trends affecting conviction rates.

stories.headline: KIDS AND VIOLENCE: Columbine aftermath
stories.summary: An exploration of underreported school violence data post-Columbine in Albuquerque schools highlighted inconsistencies and administrative challenges.

stories.headline: INSIDE UPLINK: SCHOOL VIOLENCE
stories.summary: Media focus on school violence increases, showing how computer-assisted reporting can analyze and report on the issue effectively.

stories.headline: First Venture: Learning the hard part
stories.summary: A beginner's journey in CAR, examining the response times of Columbus police, reveals the complexities and challenges of data acquisition and analysis.

stories.headline: CAMPAIGN FINANCE: The Bush files
stories.summary: Demystifying the complexity of the Bush campaign's contribution data files, focusing on converting and analyzing the data for journalistic purposes.

stories.headline: EYE ON LAWMAKERS: Staff travel records
stories.summary: An investigation into congressional travel reveals how private interests fund official trips, raising questions about influence and legislation.
